Data Fields
EDMA_Object_t_ Struct Reference
EDMA Driver Internal Data Structures

EDMA internal object (state) information structure that is required to be preserved between calls to EDMA APIs. More...

Data Fields

bool isOpen
 true if EDMA is open else false, used for error checking only, say if open is called when already open.
 
HwiP_Handle hwiTransferCompleteHandle
 handle for transfer completion interrupt object of the OS. Required to be stored to be able to delete during EDMA_close API
 
HwiP_Handle hwiErrorHandle
 handle for CC error interrupt object of the OS. Required to be stored to be able to delete during EDMA_close API
 
HwiP_Handle hwiTransferControllerErrorHandle [EDMA_MAX_NUM_TC]
 handles for TC error interrupt object of the OS for each tc Id. Required to be stored to be able to delete during EDMA_close API
 
EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn_t transferCompleteCallbackFxn [EDMA_NUM_TCC]
 Transfer completion call back function storage for each transfer completion code.
 
uintptr_t transferCompleteCallbackFxnArg [EDMA_NUM_TCC]
 Storage for argument to be returned when calling transfer completion call back in addition to transfer completion code, for each transfer completion code.
 
EDMA_qdmaObject_t qdmaObj [EDMA_NUM_QDMA_CHANNELS]
 QDMA object storage for each QDMA channel.
 
EDMA_errorCallbackFxn_t errorCallbackFxn
 CC Error call back function.
 
edmaTransferControllerErrorCallbackFxn_t transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn
 Transfer controller error call back function.
 
EDMA_transferControllerErrorIsrArgInfo_t transferControllerErrorIsrArgInfo [EDMA_MAX_NUM_TC]
 

Detailed Description

EDMA internal object (state) information structure that is required to be preserved between calls to EDMA APIs.

Field Documentation

EDMA_transferControllerErrorIsrArgInfo_t EDMA_Object_t_::transferControllerErrorIsrArgInfo[EDMA_MAX_NUM_TC]

Transfer controller error Isr argument storage for each tc.
